titleStmt.title: Meditations vpon the gospell by Saint Iohn. By Sir William Pellham, knight
titleStmt.author: Pellham, William, Sir, 1567 or 8-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. P[urslowe] for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Greene-Dragon,

notesStmt.note: Leaves A1 and Q12 probably blank, lacking.
Identified as STC 19566b on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Saint Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Greene-Dragon
